subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Beavers’ improbable run at a national championship came to an end Thursday when they lost 4-1 to Miami (Ohio) in the semifinals of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The Beavers’ improbable run at a national championship came to an end Thursday when they lost 4-1 to Miami (Ohio) in the semifinals of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
